title: Steph vs. Luka, Lebron & Melo Breaking Records, Hawks-Mavs | WHAT’S BURNIN’
itunes:title: Steph vs. Luka, Lebron & Melo Breaking Records, Hawks-Mavs | WHAT’S BURNIN’
description:
Matt and Stak talk all the latest NBA news and results in this weeks WHAT'S BURNIN'. The boys discuss the epic battle between Luka and Steph that took place over the weekend and talk Lebron & Carmelo Anthony's latest record-breaking moments. Plus, they breakdown the Jazz's hot start and if this team is a true title contender. Also, they look ahead to the best matchups this week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
